long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
📝 YouTube Transcription Downloader - Your Simple Solution for Video Transcripts

Easily download transcriptions from any video with a single click! This lightweight extension adds a convenient download button right next to the platform's native controls, making it seamless to get video transcripts.

✨ KEY FEATURES:
- One-Click Downloads: Download transcriptions directly from the video page
- Instant Access: Convenient download button appears next to the native controls
- Daily Free Credits: Get 5 free transcription downloads every day
- Automatic Reset: Credits refresh automatically at 8 AM daily
- User-Friendly: Simple toggle on/off feature in the extension popup
- No Registration: Start using immediately - no sign-up required!

🎯 PERFECT FOR:
- Students taking notes from educational videos
- Researchers collecting video content
- Content creators repurposing video content
- Journalists transcribing interviews
- Anyone needing quick access to video transcripts

💡 HOW TO USE:
1. Install the extension
2. Visit any YT video
3. Click the "Download Transcription" button next to the video
4. Get your transcription instantly!

⚡ FEATURES:
- Simple one-click download process
- Clean, intuitive interface
- Lightweight and fast
- Works on any video with captions
- Credit counter shows remaining daily downloads
- Automatic daily credit refresh

🔒 PRIVACY & SECURITY:
- No personal data collection
- No sign-up required
- Secure API implementation
- Local storage only
- No ads or tracking

💪 FREE DAILY USAGE:
- 5 free transcription downloads daily
- Resets automatically at 8 AM
- No credit card required
- No hidden fees

📢 NOTE:
This extension requires videos to have captions available to generate transcriptions.

🔄 Regular updates and improvements based on user feedback.

💌 Support:
Having issues or suggestions? Contact us at ronl.wazb@gmail.com
